title: MobLand Finale Recap: The Harrigan Rat, Revealed! Plus: Grade the Episode
description: MobLand started its inaugural season with a question: Who’s ratting on the Harrigans? And it closes Season 1 by answering that question — as well as another, more insidious one — in an episode that neatly sets up a potential Season 2. Who lives? Who dies? Who grabs power? Who winds up with a kitchen knife in […]
author: Kimberly Roots

title: Alien: Earth Stars Promise ‘Drooling, Snarling’ Xenomorphs, Say Series Is ‘Tense’ and ‘Not Just Jump Scares’
description: If you like your xenomorphs clocking in at eight feet tall and both “drooling” and “snarling,” FX and Hulu’s Alien: Earth series has you covered. Announced more than four years ago and hailing from Noah Hawley (of FX’s Fargo and Legion), Alien: Earth is set in 2120 when five corporations — Prodigy, Weyland-Yutani, Lynch, Dynamic and Threshold — wield the power of nations. In […]
author: Matt Webb Mitovich

title: Crunchyroll Winter 2023 Simulcast Slate Offers Largest Line-Up Yet
description: The Crunchyroll Winter Simulcast 2023 slate is the biggest anime line-up yet, with TRIGUN STAMPEDE, VINLAND SAGA Season 2, and more!
author: Adi Tantimedh

title: Superman & Lois, James Gunn/DCU, Sandman & More: BCTV Daily Dispatch
description: In today's BCTV Daily Dispatch: James Gunn/DCU/Superman/Henry Cavill, Superman & Lois, SNL, The Sandman, The Nevers/#Westworld & tons more!
author: Ray Flook
